name: TEnvironment
doc: is a read only environment

methods.name: Name
methods.doc: returns the name of the environment

methods.name: Qualifier
methods.doc: returns the qualifier of the environment

methods.name: Description
methods.doc: returns the description of the environment

methods.name: QualifiedName
methods.doc: returns the qualified of the environment

methods.name: Platform
methods.doc: returns the platform used to deploy environment

methods.name: HasVars
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has defined vars

methods.name: Vars
methods.doc: returns the environement vars

methods.name: Orchestrator
methods.doc: returns the orchestrator managing the environment nodes

methods.name: HasProviders
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has providers

methods.name: Providers
methods.doc: returns the environment providers

methods.name: HasNodeSets
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has nodes

methods.name: Nodesets
methods.doc: returns the environment providers

methods.name: HasStacks
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has stacks

methods.name: Stacks
methods.doc: returns the environment stacks

methods.name: HasTasks
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has tasks

methods.name: Tasks
methods.doc: returns the environment tasks

methods.name: HasHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has hooks

methods.name: Hooks
methods.doc: returns the environment hooks

methods.name: HasProvisionHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has hooks while provisioning

methods.name: HasDeployHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has hooks while deploying

methods.name: HasUndeployHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has hooks while undeploying

methods.name: HasDestroyHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has hooks while destroying

methods.name: HasTemplates
methods.doc: returns true if the environment has defined templates

methods.name: Templates
methods.doc: returns the environment templates

name: TOrchestrator
doc: is a read only orchestrator

methods.name: Parameters
methods.doc: returns the orchestrator parameters

methods.name: EnvVars
methods.doc: returns the orchestrator environment variables

methods.name: Docker
methods.doc: returns the orchestrator parameters for docker

methods.name: Component
methods.doc: returns the orchestrator component

name: TOrchestratorRef
doc: is a read only reference on the orchestrator

methods.name: Orchestrator
methods.doc: returns the orchestrator managing a node

name: TProvider
doc: is a read only provider

methods.name: Name
methods.doc: returns the name of the provider

methods.name: Parameters
methods.doc: returns the provider parameters

methods.name: EnvVars
methods.doc: returns the provider environment variables

methods.name: Proxy
methods.doc: returns the proxy definition applied to the provider

methods.name: Component
methods.doc: returns the provider component

name: TProviderRef
doc: is a read only reference on a provider

methods.name: Provider
methods.doc: returns the provider wherein the node should be deployed

name: TNodeSet
doc: is a read only node set

methods.name: Name
methods.doc: returns the name of the node set

methods.name: Instances
methods.doc: returns the number of nodes to create for this node set

methods.name: Orchestrator
methods.doc: returns the reference on the orchestrator managing the node

methods.name: Provider
methods.doc: returns the reference on the provider wherein the node should be deployed

methods.name: HasHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the node has hooks

methods.name: Hooks
methods.doc: returns the node hooks

methods.name: HasProvisionHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the node has hooks while provisioning

methods.name: HasDestroyHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the node has hooks while destroying

methods.name: HasLabels
methods.doc: returns true if the node has defined labels

methods.name: Labels
methods.doc: returns the node labels

name: TStack
doc: is a read only stack

methods.name: Name
methods.doc: returns the name of the stack

methods.name: Parameters
methods.doc: returns the stack parameters

methods.name: EnvVars
methods.doc: returns the stack environment variables

methods.name: HasHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the stack has hooks

methods.name: Hooks
methods.doc: returns the stack hooks

methods.name: HasDeployHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the stack has hooks while deploying

methods.name: HasUndeployHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the stack has hooks while undeploying

methods.name: Dependencies
methods.doc: returns the stack dependencies

methods.name: HasCopies
methods.doc: returns true if the stacks has copies

methods.name: Copies
methods.doc: returns the stack copies

name: TStackRef
doc: is a read only reference on a stack

methods.name: Stack
methods.doc: returns the stack corresponding to the ref

name: TDependencies
doc: is a read only list of stack dependencies

methods.name: HasDependencies
methods.doc: returns true if there is dependencies

methods.name: Dependencies
methods.doc: returns the references of stacks we depend on

name: TCopy
doc: is a read only representation of files to be copied

methods.name: HasLabels
methods.doc: returns true if the copy has defined labels

methods.name: Labels
methods.doc: returns the copy labels

methods.name: HasSources
methods.doc: returns true if the copy has defined sources

methods.name: Sources
methods.doc: returns the copy sources

name: TTask
doc: is a read only task

methods.name: Name
methods.doc: returns the name of the task

methods.name: Playbook
methods.doc: returns the playbook linked to the task

methods.name: Cron
methods.doc: returns the cron linked to the task

methods.name: Parameters
methods.doc: returns the task parameters

methods.name: EnvVars
methods.doc: returns the task environment variables

methods.name: HasHooks
methods.doc: returns true if the task has hooks

methods.name: Hooks
methods.doc: returns the task hooks

name: TTaskRef
doc: is a read only reference on a task

methods.name: Task
methods.doc: returns the task corresponding to the ref

name: TPlatform
doc: is a read only platform

methods.name: Base
methods.doc: returns the base location of the platform

methods.name: Distribution
methods.doc: returns the distribution used by the platform

methods.name: HasComponents
methods.doc: returns true if the platform has components

name: TBase
doc: is a read only base location

methods.name: Url
methods.doc: returns the url where the base refers

name: TUrl
doc: is a read only ekara url

methods.name: String
methods.doc: returns the string representation of the whole url

methods.name: Scheme
methods.doc: returns the url scheme

methods.name: Path
methods.doc: returns the url path

methods.name: AsFilePath
methods.doc: returns the path converted as a file path

methods.name: Host
methods.doc: returns the url host

name: TProxy
doc: is a read only proxy configuration

methods.name: Http
methods.doc: returns the proxy http definition

methods.name: Https
methods.doc: returns the proxy https definition

methods.name: NoProxy
methods.doc: returns the no proxy definition

name: TComponent
doc: is a read only component

methods.name: Id
methods.doc: returns the name of the component

methods.name: Repository
methods.doc: returns the repository where the component is located

methods.name: HasTemplates
methods.doc: returns true if the component has defined templates

methods.name: Templates
methods.doc: returns true if the component templates

name: TRepository
doc: is a read only repository

methods.name: Scm
methods.doc: returns the type of the source control management holding the repository

methods.name: Url
methods.doc: returns the url where the repository is located

methods.name: Ref
methods.doc: returns the reference (tag,branch, ...) to use within the repository

methods.name: DescriptorName
methods.doc: returns the name of the ekara descriptor for this repository

name: TEnvironmentHooks
doc: is a read only representation of the hooks associated to an environment

methods.name: HasProvision
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while provisioning

methods.name: Provision
methods.doc: returns the provisioning tasks

methods.name: HasDestroy
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while destroying

methods.name: Destroy
methods.doc: returns the destroying tasks

methods.name: HasDeploy
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while deploying

methods.name: Deploy
methods.doc: returns the deploying tasks

methods.name: HasUndeploy
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while undeploying

methods.name: Undeploy
methods.doc: returns the undeploying tasks

name: TStackHooks
doc: is a read only representation of the hooks associated to a stack

methods.name: HasDeploy
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while deploying

methods.name: Deploy
methods.doc: returns the deploying tasks

methods.name: HasUndeploy
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while undeploying

methods.name: Undeploy
methods.doc: returns the undeploying tasks

name: TTaskHooks
doc: is a read only representation of the hooks associated to a task

methods.name: HasExecute
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while executing

methods.name: Execute
methods.doc: returns the executing tasks

name: TNodeHook
doc: is a read only representation of the hooks associated to a node

methods.name: HasProvision
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while provisioning

methods.name: Provision
methods.doc: returns the provisioning tasks

methods.name: HasDestroy
methods.doc: returns true if the hooks has tasks while destroying

methods.name: Destroy
methods.doc: returns the destroyinh tasks

name: THook
doc: is a read only hooks

methods.name: After
methods.doc: returns the references of tasks to run after the hooked action

methods.name: Before
methods.doc: returns the references of tasks to run before the hooked action
